span.span: The namespace provides advanced GDI+ imaging functionality.

summary.span: 基本图形功能由 命名空间提供。

span.span: Basic graphics functionality is provided by the namespace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供的用于记录和保存图元文件的方法。The class provides methods for recording and saving metafiles. 类使用户能够扩展 GDI + 以支持任何图像格式。The class enables users to extend GDI+ to support any image format. 类提供了用于存储和检索图像文件中的元数据的方法。The class provides methods for storing and retrieving metadata in image files. > [!CAUTION] > 类中用于 Windows 或 ASP.NET 服务中不支持命名空间。Classes within the namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service. 尝试使用这些应用程序类型之一中的这些类可能会产生意外的问题，如降低服务性能和运行时异常。Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
